show.title: Single Mother’s Counterattack with Adorable Twins
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://links.kukufm.com/msUZ6S
show.description: After being deceived into a one-night stand orchestrated by her own sister, a young woman finds herself pregnant and disowned by her family. Seven years later, her spirited twin children—unaware of the circumstances of their birth—set out on a heartwarming mission to bring their long-lost parents back together, but as their mother confronts painful memories and the cruel twists of fate that shaped her past, she must brave overwhelming odds to reclaim love, dignity, and a future for her children.
show.description_secondary: After being deceived into a one-night stand orchestrated by her own sister, a young woman finds herself pregnant and disowned by her family. Seven years later, her spirited twin children—unaware of the circumstances of their birth—set out on a heartwarming mission to bring their long-lost parents back together, but as their mother confronts painful memories and the cruel twists of fate that shaped her past, she must brave overwhelming odds to reclaim love, dignity, and a future for her children.
